manifest.install:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_heka_list` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '规则ID', `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `card` varchar(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动图片', `author` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `content` varchar(500) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动描述', `cardName` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `from_user` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `hits` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `share` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `create_time` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '规则', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_heka_reply` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '规则ID', `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `picture` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动图片', `description` varchar(200) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动描述', `create_time` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '规则', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_rid` (`rid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_heka_reply`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_heka_list`;
